Calendar for our meetings

WoMoz Meetings

Please join our mailing list or keep on the look out on our twitter account as they are either every second Tuesday, at 16:00UTC or every second Wednesday at 20:00 UTC

  • Recent Meeting Notes: http://womoz.etherpad.mozilla.org/
  • Older Meeting Notes: Agenda + Notes (on the Mozilla Wiki)
  • IRC: #womoz on moznet
